description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, sets up an agent for generating movie scripts with a specific model, and executes a sample run to generate a script based on the prompt 'New York'.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: Agent
methods.description: Constructor for creating an agent that interacts with a language model to generate content.

methods.name: RunResponse
methods.description: Class representing the response from running an agent, including the generated content.

methods.name: Claude
methods.description: A class representing the Claude language model from the anthropic models.

methods.name: pprint
methods.description: Function to pretty-print the content of the run response.
